title: Isua hnenah ka him a
lyrics:
Isua hnenah ka him a,
A hmangaih awm nghengin;
A hmangaih thla zar hnuaiah,
Muangin ka chawl ve a.
Ngai teh, angel aw mawi chu,
Tuipui ram nuam chungah,
A lo thang zel mawi takkin,
Ka hnen a lo thleng ta.

Isua hnenah ka him a,
A hmangaih awm nghengin;
A hmangaih thla zar hnuaiah,
Muangin ka chawl ve a.

Isua hnenah ka him a,
Lungkhamna zawng zawng leh
Khawvel sual thlemna ata,
Chutah ka him zel a.
Lungngaih, mangan, hlauhna te,
Rinnhlelh a bo tawh ang;
Mittui tlak leh buainate,
Ka tan a rei lo'ng.

Ka thinlung chawlhna turin,
Ka tan Isua a thi;
Ka himna, Chatuan Lungpui,
Ka rinchhan ber a ni.
Hetah muangin chawl ila,
Zan thim a ral th lengin;
Chatuan ram eng mawi taka,
Zing eng a lan thlengin.
